data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bílý, Svatopluk (2006): Two new species in the Anthaxia (Anthaxia) candens (Panzer, 1793) species­group from Iran and Turkey, with taxonomic notes on the group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae). Zootaxa 1309: 25-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173848
